thread.title: Chrissy Teigen agrees that John Legend looks like 'Arthur'
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen agrees that John Legend looks like 'Arthur'

author: Kayla Bazile
title: Chrissy Teigen agrees that John Legend looks like 'Arthur'
text:
Chrissy Teigen not only loves poking fun of herself, she also doesn't mind poke fun at her husband.
It's no secret that Teigen and John Legend like to bring attention to their relationship, from spending their nights playing with Snapchat filters to helping each other with wardrobe malfunctions .
The down-to-Earth couple were back at it again on Twitter yesterday after user Emily Sowah highlighted the fact that Legend happened to resemble everyone's favorite aardvark from the kid's show Arthur.
SEE ALSO: The internet bands together to help Chrissy Teigen get Fun Dip off her hands
John Legend look like Arthur lowkey pic.twitter.com/bfeG3cYo4M
— Emily Sowah (@sowahblanket) February 20, 2017
Not one to shy away from a great comedic opportunity, Teigen joined in the fun by agreeing with the comparison with a very appropriate reaction meme .
John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/0NW3NDtAb1
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 21, 2017
Legend responded to his wife by claiming that he had no idea who Arthur was until now. And, to be fair, the show did premiere in 1996 so maybe he couldn't appreciate it like the rest of us.
@chrissyteigen I hadn't even heard of this Arthur character til now. Was he around when I was a kid?
— John Legend (@johnlegend) February 21, 2017
Hey, if you can't laugh at your husband, who else can?
BONUS: John Legend and Common deliver stirring Oscars acceptance speech
